create.name: Create
create.description: Shows a notification on the notifications panel.

notification_id.name: Notification ID
notification_id.description: ID of the notification. This new notification will overwrite an existing notification with the same ID.

dismiss.name: Dismiss
dismiss.description: Deletes a notification from the notifications panel.

notification_id.name: Notification ID
notification_id.description: ID of the notification to be deleted.

dismiss_all.name: Dismiss all
dismiss_all.description: Deletes all notifications from the notifications panel.

save_persistent_states.name: Save persistent states
save_persistent_states.description: Saves the persistent states immediately. Maintains the normal periodic saving interval.

turn_off.name: Generic turn off
turn_off.description: Generic action to turn devices off under any domain.

turn_on.name: Generic turn on
turn_on.description: Generic action to turn devices on under any domain.

toggle.name: Generic toggle
toggle.description: Generic action to toggle devices on/off under any domain.

check_config.name: Check configuration
check_config.description: Checks the Home Assistant YAML-configuration files for errors. Errors will be shown in the Home Assistant logs.

update_entity.name: Update entity
update_entity.description: Forces one or more entities to update their data.

entity_id.name: Entities to update
entity_id.description: List of entities to force update.

reload_core_config.name: Reload Core configuration
reload_core_config.description: Reloads the Core configuration from the YAML-configuration.

elevation.name: Elevation
elevation.description: Elevation of your location above sea level.

reload_custom_templates.name: Reload custom Jinja2 templates
reload_custom_templates.description: Reloads Jinja2 templates found in the `custom_templates` folder in your config. New values will be applied on the next render of the template.

entry_id.name: Config entry ID
entry_id.description: The configuration entry ID of the entry to be reloaded.

reload_all.name: Reload all
reload_all.description: Reload all YAML configuration that can be reloaded without restarting Home Assistant.

logger.name: Logger
logger.description: Logger name under which to log the message. Defaults to `system_log.external`.

set_default_level.name: Set default level
set_default_level.description: Sets the default log level for integrations.

level.name: Level
level.description: Default severity level for all integrations.

set_level.name: Set level
set_level.description: Sets the log level for one or more integrations.

set_theme.name: Set the default theme
set_theme.description: Sets the default theme Home Assistant uses. Can be overridden by a user.

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Starts purge task - to clean up old data from your database.

keep_days.name: Days to keep
keep_days.description: Number of days to keep the data in the database. Starting today, counting backward. A value of `7` means that everything older than a week will be purged.

repack.name: Repack
repack.description: Attempt to save disk space by rewriting the entire database file.

apply_filter.name: Apply filter
apply_filter.description: Apply `entity_id` and `event_type` filters in addition to time-based purge.

purge_entities.name: Purge entities
purge_entities.description: Starts a purge task to remove the data related to specific entities from your database.

entity_id.name: Entities to remove
entity_id.description: List of entities for which the data is to be removed from the recorder database.

domains.name: Domains to remove
domains.description: List of domains for which the data needs to be removed from the recorder database.

entity_globs.name: Entity globs to remove
entity_globs.description: List of glob patterns used to select the entities for which the data is to be removed from the recorder database.

keep_days.name: Days to keep
keep_days.description: Number of days to keep the data for rows matching the filter. Starting today, counting backward. A value of `7` means that everything older than a week will be purged. The default of 0 days will remove all matching rows immediately.

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Starts the recording of events and state changes.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: Stops the recording of events and state changes.

addon_update.name: Update add-on
addon_update.description: Updates an add-on. This action should be used with caution since add-on updates can contain breaking changes. It is highly recommended that you review release notes/change logs before updating an add-on.

addon_stdin.name: Write data to add-on stdin
addon_stdin.description: Writes data to the add-on's standard input.

password.name: Password
password.description: Password to protect the backup with.

location.name: Location
location.description: Name of a backup network storage to host backups.

homeassistant_exclude_database.name: Home Assistant exclude database
homeassistant_exclude_database.description: Exclude the Home Assistant database file from the backup.

homeassistant.name: Home Assistant settings
homeassistant.description: Includes Home Assistant settings in the backup.

homeassistant_exclude_database.name: Home Assistant exclude database
homeassistant_exclude_database.description: Exclude the Home Assistant database file from the backup.

addons.name: Add-ons
addons.description: List of add-ons to include in the backup. Use the name slug of each add-on.

folders.name: Folders
folders.description: List of directories to include in the backup.

password.name: Password
password.description: Password to protect the backup with.

location.name: Location
location.description: Name of a backup network storage to host backups.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

folders.name: Folders
folders.description: List of directories to restore from the backup.

addons.name: Add-ons
addons.description: List of add-ons to restore from the backup. Use the name slug of each add-on.

install.name: Install update
install.description: Installs an update for a device or service.

version.name: Version
version.description: The version to install. If omitted, the latest version will be installed.

backup.name: Backup
backup.description: If supported by the integration, this creates a backup before starting the update.

skip.name: Skip update
skip.description: Marks currently available update as skipped.

clear_skipped.name: Clear skipped update
clear_skipped.description: Removes the skipped version marker from an update.

remote_connect.name: Enable remote access
remote_connect.description: Makes the instance UI accessible from outside of the local network by enabling your Home Assistant Cloud connection.

remote_disconnect.name: Disable remote access
remote_disconnect.description: Disconnects the instance UI from Home Assistant Cloud. This disables access to it from outside your local network.

start.name: Start
start.description: Sends a start command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will start. Platform dependent.

stop.name: Stop
stop.description: Sends a stop command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will stop. Platform dependent.

restart.name: Restart
restart.description: Sends a restart command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will restart. Platform dependent.

speak.name: Speak
speak.description: Speaks something using text-to-speech on a media player.

media_player_entity_id.name: Media player entity
media_player_entity_id.description: Media players to play the message.

message.name: Message
message.description: The text you want to convert into speech so that you can listen to it on your device.

cache.name: Cache
cache.description: Stores this message locally so that when the text is requested again, the output can be produced more quickly.

language.name: Language
language.description: Language to use for speech generation.

clear_cache.name: Clear TTS cache
clear_cache.description: Removes all cached text-to-speech files and purges the memory.

cloud_say.name: Say a TTS message with cloud
cloud_say.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with cloud.

process.name: Process
process.description: Launches a conversation from a transcribed text.

language.name: Language
language.description: Language of text. Defaults to server language.

agent_id.name: Agent
agent_id.description: Conversation agent to process your request. The conversation agent is the brains of your assistant. It processes the incoming text commands.

conversation_id.name: Conversation ID
conversation_id.description: ID of the conversation, to be able to continue a previous conversation

language.name: Language
language.description: Language to clear cached intents for. Defaults to server language.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: Reloads the scenes from the YAML-configuration.

entities.name: Entities state
entities.description: List of entities and their target state.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Time it takes the devices to transition into the states defined in the scene.

scene_id.name: Scene entity ID
scene_id.description: The entity ID of the new scene.

entities.name: Entity states
entities.description: List of entities and their target state. If your entities are already in the target state right now, use 'Entities snapshot' instead.

snapshot_entities.name: Entities snapshot
snapshot_entities.description: List of entities to be included in the snapshot. By taking a snapshot, you record the current state of those entities. If you do not want to use the current state of all your entities for this scene, you can combine 'Entities snapshot' with 'Entity states'.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Time it takes the devices to transition into the states defined in the scene.

create_automatic.name: Create automatic backup
create_automatic.description: Creates a new backup with automatic backup settings.

press.name: Press
press.description: Mimics the physical button press on the device.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: Reloads group configuration, entities, and notify services from YAML-configuration.

object_id.name: Object ID
object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Name of the icon for the group.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: List of all members in the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Add entities` or `Remove entities`.

add_entities.name: Add entities
add_entities.description: List of members to be added to the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Remove entities`.

remove_entities.name: Remove entities
remove_entities.description: List of members to be removed from a group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Add entities`.

all.name: All
all.description: Enable this option if the group should only be used when all entities are in state `on`.

object_id.name: Object ID
object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the last to the first option on the list.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the first to the last option on the list.

log.name: Log
log.description: Creates a custom entry in the logbook.

name.name: Name
name.description: Custom name for an entity, can be referenced using the 'Entity ID' field.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity to reference in the logbook entry.

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: Determines which icon is used in the logbook entry. The icon illustrates the integration domain related to this logbook entry.

start.name: Start
start.description: Starts a timer or restarts it with a provided duration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Custom duration to restart the timer with.

pause.name: Pause
pause.description: Pauses a running timer, retaining the remaining duration for later continuation.

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.description: Resets a timer's duration to the last known initial value without firing the timer finished event.

finish.name: Finish
finish.description: Finishes a running timer earlier than scheduled.

change.name: Change
change.description: Changes a timer by adding or subtracting a given duration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Duration to add to or subtract from the running timer.

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Increments the current value by 1 step.

decrement.name: Decrement
decrement.description: Decrements the current value by 1 step.

announce.name: Announce
announce.description: Lets a satellite announce a message.

media_id.name: Media ID
media_id.description: The media ID to announce instead of using text-to-speech.

start_conversation.name: Start conversation
start_conversation.description: Starts a conversation from a satellite.

start_message.example: You left the lights on in the living room. Turn them off?
start_message.name: Message

start_media_id.name: Media ID
start_media_id.description: The media ID to start with instead of using text-to-speech.

extra_system_prompt.name: Extra system prompt
extra_system_prompt.description: Provide background information to the AI about the request.

seek_forward.name: Seek forward
seek_forward.description: Seeks forward by a set number of seconds.

seek_backward.name: Seek backward
seek_backward.description: Seeks backward by a set number of seconds.

seek_by.name: Seek by
seek_by.description: Seeks by an inputted number of seconds.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.description: Number of seconds to seek by. Negative numbers seek backwards.

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turns on the power of the media player.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turns off the power of the media player.

clear_playlist.name: Clear playlist
clear_playlist.description: Removes all items from the playlist.

volume_level.name: Level
volume_level.description: The volume. 0 is inaudible, 1 is the maximum volume.

volume_mute.name: Mute/unmute volume
volume_mute.description: Mutes or unmutes the media player.

is_volume_muted.name: Muted
is_volume_muted.description: Defines whether or not it is muted.

media_seek.name: Seek
media_seek.description: Allows you to go to a different part of the media that is currently playing.

seek_position.name: Position
seek_position.description: Target position in the currently playing media. The format is platform dependent.

join.name: Join
join.description: Groups media players together for synchronous playback. Only works on supported multiroom audio systems.

group_members.name: Group members
group_members.description: The players which will be synced with the playback specified in 'Targets'.

select_source.name: Select source
select_source.description: Sends the media player the command to change input source.

source.name: Source
source.description: Name of the source to switch to. Platform dependent.

sound_mode.name: Sound mode
sound_mode.description: Name of the sound mode to switch to.

media_content_id.name: Content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to play. Platform dependent.

media_content_type.name: Content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to play, such as image, music, tv show, video, episode, channel, or playlist.

enqueue.name: Enqueue
enqueue.description: If the content should be played now or be added to the queue.

announce.name: Announce
announce.description: If the media should be played as an announcement.

media_content_type.name: Content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to browse, such as image, music, tv show, video, episode, channel, or playlist.

media_content_id.name: Content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to browse. Integration dependent.

shuffle_set.name: Set shuffle
shuffle_set.description: Enables or disables the shuffle mode.

shuffle.name: Shuffle mode
shuffle.description: Whether the media should be played in randomized order or not.

unjoin.name: Unjoin
unjoin.description: Removes the player from a group. Only works on platforms which support player groups.

repeat.name: Repeat mode
repeat.description: Whether the media (one or all) should be played in a loop or not.

snapshot.name: Take snapshot
snapshot.description: Takes a snapshot from a camera.

play_stream.name: Play stream
play_stream.description: Plays the camera stream on a supported media player.

format.name: Format
format.description: Stream format supported by the media player.

record.name: Record
record.description: Creates a recording of a live camera feed.

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Full path to filename. Must be mp4.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Planned duration of the recording. The actual duration may vary.

lookback.name: Lookback
lookback.description: Planned lookback period to include in the recording (in addition to the duration). Only available if there is currently an active HLS stream. The actual length of the lookback period may vary.

set_bridge.name: Set bridge
set_bridge.description: Set the bridge to be used by the Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox. Keep in mind that changing the bridge by the box takes a while (about 15 seconds it seems). After the bridge has changed you might need to select the `entertainment_area` if connectionstate is `invalidgroup` instead of `connected`.

bridge_id.name: Bridge ID
bridge_id.description: ID of the bridge. A hexadecimal code of 16 characters.

bridge_username.name: Username
bridge_username.description: Username (a.k.a. application key) valid for the bridge. A long code of random characters.

bridge_clientkey.name: Clientkey
bridge_clientkey.description: Clientkey that belongs with the username. A hexadecimal code of 32 characters.

set_sync_state.name: Set light sync state
set_sync_state.description: Control the complete light sync state of the Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox with one call.

power.name: Power
power.description: Turn the box on or off.

sync.name: Light sync
sync.description: Set light sync state on or off. Setting this to on will also turn on the box.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: Mode to set. Setting the mode will also turn on the box and start light sync.

entertainment_area.name: Entertainment area
entertainment_area.description: Entertainment area to select. Name must match _exactly_

get_schedule.name: Get schedule
get_schedule.description: Retrieves the configured time ranges of one or multiple schedules.

publish.name: Publish
publish.description: Publishes a message to an MQTT topic.

payload.name: Payload
payload.description: The payload to publish. Publishes an empty message if not provided.

evaluate_payload.name: Evaluate payload
evaluate_payload.description: When `payload` is a Python bytes literal, evaluate the bytes literal and publish the raw data.

qos.name: QoS
qos.description: Quality of Service to use. 0: At most once. 1: At least once. 2: Exactly once.

retain.name: Retain
retain.description: If the message should have the retain flag set. If set, the broker stores the most recent message on a topic.

dump.name: Export
dump.description: Writes all messages on a specific topic into the `mqtt_dump.txt` file in your configuration folder.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: How long we should listen for messages in seconds.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: Reloads MQTT entities from the YAML-configuration.

reconnect_client.name: Reconnect wireless client
reconnect_client.description: Tries to get wireless client to reconnect to UniFi Network.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The device that should be forced to reconnect to the wireless network.

remove_clients.name: Remove clients from the UniFi Network
remove_clients.description: Cleans up clients that has only been associated with the controller for a short period of time.

persistent_notification.name: Send a persistent notification
persistent_notification.description: Sends a notification that is visible in the notifications panel.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.
message.name: Message

data.name: Data
data.description: Some integrations provide extended functionality via this field. For more information, refer to the integration documentation.

reactive_inc.name: Send a notification with reactive_inc
reactive_inc.description: Sends a notification message using the reactive_inc service.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_its_an_watchy.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_its_an_watchy integration.

mobile_app_sm_g981u1.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_sm_g981u1 integration.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_magicdrawingpad.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_magicdrawingpad integration.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_pixel_9_pro.name: Send a notification via mobile_app_pixel_9_pro
mobile_app_pixel_9_pro.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_pixel_9_pro integration.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_pixel_tablet.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_pixel_tablet integration.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_sm_s931b.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_sm_s931b integration.

notify.name: Send a notification with notify
notify.description: Sends a notification message using the notify service.

nvidia_shield.description: Sends a notification message using the nvidia_shield service.

send_magic_packet.name: Send magic packet
send_magic_packet.description: Sends a 'magic packet' to wake up a device with 'Wake-On-LAN' capabilities.

mac.name: MAC address
mac.description: MAC address of the device to wake up.

broadcast_address.name: Broadcast address
broadcast_address.description: The IP address of the host to send the magic packet to. Defaults to `255.255.255.255` and is normally not changed.

broadcast_port.name: Broadcast port
broadcast_port.description: The port to send the magic packet to. Defaults to `9` and is normally not changed.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggles climate device, from on to off, or off to on.

set_cover_position.name: Set position
set_cover_position.description: Moves a cover to a specific position.

set_cover_tilt_position.name: Set tilt position
set_cover_tilt_position.description: Moves a cover tilt to a specific position.

increase_speed.name: Increase speed
increase_speed.description: Increases the speed of a fan.

percentage_step.name: Increment
percentage_step.description: Percentage step by which the speed should be increased.

decrease_speed.name: Decrease speed
decrease_speed.description: Decreases the speed of a fan.

percentage_step.name: Decrement
percentage_step.description: Percentage step by which the speed should be decreased.

oscillate.name: Oscillate
oscillate.description: Controls the oscillation of a fan.

set_percentage.name: Set speed
set_percentage.description: Sets the speed of a fan.

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turns on one or more lights and adjusts their properties, even when they are turned on already.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.

rgb_color.name: Color
rgb_color.description: The color in RGB format. A list of three integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, and blue.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number indicating the percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 100 is the maximum brightness.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turns off one or more lights.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggles one or more lights, from on to off, or off to on, based on their current state.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.

rgb_color.name: Color
rgb_color.description: The color in RGB format. A list of three integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, and blue.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number indicating the percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 100 is the maximum brightness.

code.name: Code
code.description: Code used to unlock the lock.

code.name: Code
code.description: Code used to lock the lock.

code.name: Code
code.description: Code used to open the lock.

set_value.name: Set
set_value.description: Sets the value of a number.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the last to the first.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the first to the last.

start.name: Start
start.description: Starts or resumes the cleaning task.

return_to_base.name: Return to dock
return_to_base.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.

clean_spot.name: Clean spot
clean_spot.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to do a spot clean-up.

set_fan_speed.name: Set fan speed
set_fan_speed.description: Sets the fan speed of the vacuum cleaner.

fan_speed.name: Fan speed
fan_speed.description: Fan speed. The value depends on the integration. Some integrations have speed steps, like 'medium'. Some use a percentage, between 0 and 100.

send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Sends a command to the vacuum cleaner.

command.name: Command
command.description: Command to execute. The commands are integration-specific.

params.name: Parameters
params.description: Parameters for the command. The parameters are integration-specific.

set_valve_position.name: Set position
set_valve_position.description: Moves a valve to a specific position.

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Increments a counter by its step size.

decrement.name: Decrement
decrement.description: Decrements a counter by its step size.

reset.name: Reset
reset.description: Resets a counter to its initial value.

set_value.name: Set
set_value.description: Sets the counter to a specific value.

value.name: Value
value.description: The new counter value the entity should be set to.

timestamp.name: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The target date & time, expressed by a UNIX timestamp.

show_lovelace_view.name: Show dashboard view
show_lovelace_view.description: Shows a dashboard view on a Chromecast device.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Media player entity to show the dashboard view on.

dashboard_path.name: Dashboard path
dashboard_path.description: The URL path of the dashboard to show.

view_path.name: View path
view_path.description: The URL path of the dashboard view to show.

generate_image.name: Generate image
generate_image.description: Turns a prompt into an image

config_entry.name: Config entry
config_entry.description: The config entry to use for this action

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.description: The text to turn into an image

size.name: Size
size.description: The size of the image to generate

quality.name: Quality
quality.description: The quality of the image that will be generated

style.name: Style
style.description: The style of the generated image

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Runs the sequence of actions defined in a script.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Starts a script if it isn't running, stops it otherwise.

add_meter_reading.name: Add meter reading
add_meter_reading.description: Adds a meter reading to Tado Energy IQ.

config_entry.name: Config Entry
config_entry.description: Config entry to add meter reading to.

reading.name: Reading
reading.description: Reading in m or kWh without decimals.

set_water_heater_timer.name: Set water heater timer
set_water_heater_timer.description: Turns on water heater for a set time.

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: Set the time period for the boost.

set_climate_timer.name: Set climate timer
set_climate_timer.description: Turns on climate entities for a set time.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature to set climate entity to.

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: Choose this or 'Overlay'. Set the time period for the change if you want to be specific.

requested_overlay.name: Overlay
requested_overlay.description: Choose this or 'Time period'. Allows you to choose an overlay. MANUAL:=Overlay until user removes; NEXT_TIME_BLOCK:=Overlay until next timeblock; TADO_DEFAULT:=Overlay based on Tado app setting.

set_climate_temperature_offset.name: Set climate temperature offset
set_climate_temperature_offset.description: Sets the temperature offset of climate entities.

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Offset you would like (depending on your device).

search.name: Search Music Assistant
search.description: Performs a global search on the Music Assistant library and all providers.

config_entry_id.name: Music Assistant instance
config_entry_id.description: Select the Music Assistant instance to perform the search on.

media_type.name: Media type(s)
media_type.description: The type of the content to search. Such as artist, album, track, radio, or playlist. All types if omitted.

artist.name: Artist name
artist.description: When specifying a track or album name in the name field, you can optionally restrict results by this artist name.

album.name: Album name
album.description: When specifying a track name in the name field, you can optionally restrict results by this album name.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (per media type).

library_only.name: Only library items
library_only.description: Only include results that are in the library.

get_library.name: Get library items
get_library.description: Retrieves items from a Music Assistant library.

config_entry_id.name: Music Assistant instance
config_entry_id.description: Select the Music Assistant instance to perform the search on.

media_type.name: Media type
media_type.description: The media type for which to request details for.

favorite.name: Favorites only
favorite.description: Filter items so only favorites items are returned.

search.name: Search
search.description: Optional search string to search through this library.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to return.

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Offset to start the list from.

order_by.name: Order by
order_by.description: Sort the list by this field.

album_artists_only.name: Enable album artists filter (only for artist library)
album_artists_only.description: Only return album artists when listing the artists library items.

play_media.name: Play media
play_media.description: Plays media on a Music Assistant player with more fine-grained control options.

media_id.name: Media ID(s)
media_id.description: URI or name of the item you want to play. Specify a list if you want to play/enqueue multiple items.

media_type.name: Media type
media_type.description: The type of the content to play. Such as artist, album, track or playlist. Will be auto-determined if omitted.

artist.name: Artist name
artist.description: When specifying a track or album by name in the Media ID field, you can optionally restrict results by this artist name.

album.name: Album name
album.description: When specifying a track by name in the Media ID field, you can optionally restrict results by this album name.

enqueue.name: Enqueue
enqueue.description: If the content should be played now or added to the queue.

radio_mode.name: Enable radio mode
radio_mode.description: Enable radio mode to auto-generate a playlist based on the selection.

play_announcement.name: Play announcement
play_announcement.description: Plays an announcement on a Music Assistant player with more fine-grained control options.

use_pre_announce.name: Use pre-announce
use_pre_announce.description: Use pre-announcement sound for the announcement. Omit to use the player default.

announce_volume.name: Announce volume
announce_volume.description: Use a forced volume level for the announcement. Omit to use player default.

transfer_queue.name: Transfer queue
transfer_queue.description: Transfers a player's queue to another player.

source_player.name: Source media player
source_player.description: The source media player which has the queue you want to transfer. When omitted, the first playing player will be used.

auto_play.name: Auto play
auto_play.description: Start playing the queue on the target player. Omit to use the default behavior.

get_queue.name: Get playerQueue details (advanced)
get_queue.description: Retrieves the details of the currently active queue of a Music Assistant player.

snapshot.name: Take snapshot
snapshot.description: Takes a snapshot from an image.

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Template of a filename. Variable available is `entity_id`.

see.name: See
see.description: Manually update the records of a seen legacy device tracker in the known_devices.yaml file.

dev_id.name: Device ID
dev_id.description: ID of the device (find the ID in `known_devices.yaml`).

location_name.name: Location
location_name.description: Name of the location where the device is located. The options are: `home`, `not_home`, or the name of the zone.

gps.name: GPS coordinates
gps.description: GPS coordinates where the device is located, specified by latitude and longitude (for example: [51.513845, -0.100539]).

identify.name: Identify
identify.description: Identifies an Elgato Light. Blinks the light, which can be useful for, e.g., a visual notification.

activity.name: Activity
activity.description: Activity ID or activity name to be started.

send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Sends a command or a list of commands to a device.

device.name: Device
device.description: Device ID to send command to.

command.name: Command
command.description: A single command or a list of commands to send.

num_repeats.name: Repeats
num_repeats.description: The number of times you want to repeat the commands.

delay_secs.name: Delay seconds
delay_secs.description: The time you want to wait in between repeated commands.

hold_secs.name: Hold seconds
hold_secs.description: The time you want to have it held before the release is send.

learn_command.name: Learn command
learn_command.description: Learns a command or a list of commands from a device.

device.name: Device
device.description: Device ID to learn command from.

command.name: Command
command.description: A single command or a list of commands to learn.

command_type.name: Command type
command_type.description: The type of command to be learned.

alternative.name: Alternative
alternative.description: If code must be stored as an alternative. This is useful for discrete codes. Discrete codes are used for toggles that only perform one function. For example, a code to only turn a device on. If it is on already, sending the code won't change the state.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for the command to be learned.

delete_command.name: Delete command
delete_command.description: Deletes a command or a list of commands from the database.

device.name: Device
device.description: Device from which commands will be deleted.

command.name: Command
command.description: The single command or the list of commands to be deleted.

get_forecasts.name: Get forecasts
get_forecasts.description: Retrieves the forecast from selected weather services.

type.name: Forecast type
type.description: The scope of the weather forecast.

activate_scene.name: Activate Hue scene
activate_scene.description: Activates a Hue scene with more control over the options.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Transition duration it takes to bring devices to the state defined in the scene.

dynamic.name: Dynamic
dynamic.description: Enable dynamic mode of the scene.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: Speed of dynamic palette for this scene.

hue_activate_scene.name: Activate scene
hue_activate_scene.description: Activates a Hue scene stored in the Hue hub.

group_name.name: Group
group_name.description: Name of Hue group/room from the Hue app.

scene_name.name: Scene
scene_name.description: Name of Hue scene from the Hue app.

dynamic.name: Dynamic
dynamic.description: Enable dynamic mode of the scene (V2 bridges and supported scenes only).

send_command.name: Send Command
send_command.description: Send an arbitrary command to the 3D printer

command.name: Command
command.description: The command to send to the printer

print_project_file.name: Print 3MF project file
print_project_file.description: Print sliced 3MF file stored on the SD card

vibration_cali.name: Vibration Calibration
vibration_cali.description: Perform vibration calibration (aka XY Mech Sweep) before print

layer_inspect.name: First Layer Inspection
layer_inspect.description: Perform first layer inspection during print

use_ams.name: Use AMS
use_ams.description: Use AMS for print. Uses external spool otherwise

objects.name: Object IDs
objects.description: Object IDs are available from printable objects entity attributes

axis.name: Axis
axis.description: The axis to move. X1 and P1 devices, X and Y move the printhead, Z moves the bed. A1, Z moves the gantry, Y the bed, X the printhead.

distance.name: Distance
distance.description: The distance (in mm) to move the axis A negative distance moves Z up, X left, Y forward.

unload_filament.name: Unload filament
unload_filament.description: Unload the filament currently loaded into the extruder

load_filament.name: Load filament
load_filament.description: Load a new filament into the extruder passed an AMS tray or an External spool entity

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Target nozzle temperature once the filament is loaded. By default uses the midpoint between min and max temperature of the chosen filament.

extrude_retract.name: Extrude or retract filament
extrude_retract.description: Perform an extrusion or extraction of the loaded filament

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of extrude action to perform

force.name: Force
force.description: Perform extrusion or retraction if nozzle temperature is below 170C.

set_filament.name: Set filament
set_filament.description: Sets filament details on an AMS tray or an External spool entity

tray_info_idx.name: Filament ID
tray_info_idx.description: Bambu's filament ID. E.g. GFL96 is Generic PLA Silk

tray_color.name: Color
tray_color.description: RGBA value for the color. E.g. FF0000FF is opaque red.

nozzle_temp_min.name: Minimum recommended nozzle temperature
nozzle_temp_min.description: The minimum temperature that it is recommended to print this filament at.

nozzle_temp_max.name: Maximum recommended nozzle temperature
nozzle_temp_max.description: The maximum temperature that it is recommended to print this filament at.

get_filament_data.name: Gets a json string with details about all known filaments
get_filament_data.description: Gets a json string with details about all known filaments

alarm_arm_home.name: Arm home
alarm_arm_home.description: Arms the alarm in the home mode.

alarm_arm_away.name: Arm away
alarm_arm_away.description: Arms the alarm in the away mode.

alarm_arm_night.name: Arm night
alarm_arm_night.description: Arms the alarm in the night mode.

alarm_arm_vacation.name: Arm vacation
alarm_arm_vacation.description: Arms the alarm in the vacation mode.

alarm_arm_custom_bypass.name: Arm with custom bypass
alarm_arm_custom_bypass.description: Arms the alarm while allowing to bypass a custom area.

calendar_id.name: Calendar ID
calendar_id.description: The id of the calendar you want.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Acts as the title of the event.

description.name: Description
description.description: The description of the event. Optional.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: The date the whole day event should start.

end_date.name: End date

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Acts as the title of the event.

description.name: Description
description.description: The description of the event. Optional.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: The date the whole day event should start.

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: The date the whole day event should end.

in.name: In
in.description: Days or weeks that you want to create the event in.

location.name: Location
location.description: The location of the event. Optional.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: New target temperature for the water heater.

operation_mode.name: Operation mode
operation_mode.description: New value of the operation mode. For a list of possible modes, refer to the integration documentation.

operation_mode.name: Operation mode
operation_mode.description: New value of the operation mode. For a list of possible modes, refer to the integration documentation.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Defines the short summary or subject for the event.

description.example: Meeting to provide technical review for 'Phoenix' design.
description.name: Description
description.description: A more complete description of the event than the one provided by the summary.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: The date the all-day event should start.

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: The date the all-day event should end (exclusive).

in.name: In
in.description: Days or weeks that you want to create the event in.

get_events.name: Get events
get_events.description: Get events on a calendar within a time range.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: Returns active events after this time (exclusive). When not set, defaults to now.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: Returns active events before this time (exclusive). Cannot be used with Duration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Returns active events from Start time for the specified duration.

export_recording.name: Export recording
export_recording.description: Export a custom recording or timelapse.

favorite_event.name: Favorite or unfavorite Event
favorite_event.description: Favorites or unfavorites an event. Favorited events are retained indefinitely.

event_id.name: Event ID
event_id.description: ID of the event to favorite or unfavorite.

favorite.name: Favorite
favorite.description: If the event should be favorited or unfavorited. Enable to favorite, disable to unfavorite.

ptz.name: Control camera via PTZ
ptz.description: Pan / Tilt, Zoom, or move a camera to a preset

argument.name: PTZ Action
argument.description: left, right, up, down for move; in, out for zoom; name of preset

create_event.name: Create an event
create_event.description: Create a manual event with a given label for a camera.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Predetermined length of event. Default is 30 seconds. Use 0 for indefinite.

include_recording.name: Include Recording
include_recording.description: Whether the event should save recordings along with the snapshot that is taken.

end_event.name: End an event
end_event.description: End a manual event with a given id for a camera.

event_id.name: Event ID
event_id.description: ID of the event to end.

set_persons_home.name: Set persons at home
set_persons_home.description: Sets a list of persons as at home. Person's name must match a name known by the Netatmo Indoor (Welcome) Camera.

set_person_away.name: Set person away
set_person_away.description: Sets a person as away. If no person is set the home will be marked as empty. Person's name must match a name known by the Netatmo Indoor (Welcome) Camera.

set_camera_light.name: Set camera light mode
set_camera_light.description: Sets the light mode for a Netatmo Outdoor camera light.

set_schedule.name: Set heating schedule
set_schedule.description: Sets the heating schedule for Netatmo climate device. The schedule name must match a schedule configured at Netatmo.

set_preset_mode_with_end_datetime.name: Set preset mode with end date & time
set_preset_mode_with_end_datetime.description: Sets the preset mode for a Netatmo climate device. The preset mode must match a preset mode configured at Netatmo.

preset_mode.name: Preset mode
preset_mode.description: Climate preset mode such as Schedule, Away or Frost Guard.

end_datetime.name: End date & time
end_datetime.description: Date & time the preset will be active until.

set_temperature_with_end_datetime.name: Set temperature with end date & time
set_temperature_with_end_datetime.description: Sets the target temperature for a Netatmo climate device with an end date & time.

target_temperature.name: Target temperature
target_temperature.description: The target temperature for the device.

end_datetime.name: End date & time
end_datetime.description: Date & time the target temperature will be active until.

set_temperature_with_time_period.name: Set temperature with time period
set_temperature_with_time_period.description: Sets the target temperature for a Netatmo climate device with time period.

target_temperature.name: Target temperature
target_temperature.description: The target temperature for the device.

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: The time period which the temperature setting will be active for.

clear_temperature_setting.name: Clear temperature setting
clear_temperature_setting.description: Clears any temperature setting for a Netatmo climate device reverting it to the current preset or schedule.

register_webhook.name: Register webhook
register_webhook.description: Registers the webhook to the Netatmo backend.

unregister_webhook.name: Unregister webhook
unregister_webhook.description: Unregisters the webhook from the Netatmo backend.

snapshot.name: Snapshot
snapshot.description: Takes a snapshot of a media player.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will be snapshot.

with_group.name: With group
with_group.description: Whether the snapshot should include the group layout and the state of other speakers in the group.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: Restores a snapshot of a media player.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will be restored.

with_group.name: With group
with_group.description: Whether the group layout and the state of other speakers in the group should also be restored.

sleep_time.name: Sleep Time
sleep_time.description: Number of seconds to set the timer.

update_alarm.name: Update alarm
update_alarm.description: Updates an alarm with new time and volume settings.

alarm_id.name: Alarm ID
alarm_id.description: The ID of the alarm to be updated.

enabled.name: Alarm enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the alarm.

include_linked_zones.name: Include linked zones
include_linked_zones.description: Whether the alarm also plays on grouped players.

play_queue.name: Play queue
play_queue.description: Starts playing the queue from the first item.

queue_position.name: Queue position
queue_position.description: Position of the song in the queue to start playing from.

remove_from_queue.name: Remove from queue
remove_from_queue.description: Removes an item from the queue.

queue_position.name: Queue position
queue_position.description: Position in the queue to remove.

get_queue.name: Get queue
get_queue.description: Returns the contents of the queue.

trigger.name: Trigger
trigger.description: Triggers the actions of an automation.

skip_condition.name: Skip conditions
skip_condition.description: Defines whether or not the conditions will be skipped.

vacuum_remote_control_start.name: Vacuum remote control start
vacuum_remote_control_start.description: Start remote control of the vacuum cleaner. You can then move it with `remote_control_move`, when done call `remote_control_stop`.

vacuum_remote_control_stop.name: Vacuum remote control stop
vacuum_remote_control_stop.description: Stop remote control mode of the vacuum cleaner.

vacuum_remote_control_move.name: Vacuum remote control move
vacuum_remote_control_move.description: Remote control the vacuum cleaner, make sure you first set it in remote control mode with `remote_control_start`.

vacuum_remote_control_move_step.name: Vacuum remote control move step
vacuum_remote_control_move_step.description: Remote control the vacuum cleaner, only makes one move and then stops.

vacuum_clean_zone.name: Vacuum clean zone
vacuum_clean_zone.description: Start the cleaning operation in the selected areas for the number of repeats indicated.

zone.name: Zone
zone.description: Array of zones. Each zone is an array of 4 integer values.

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning repeats for each zone.

vacuum_clean_segment.name: Vacuum clean segment
vacuum_clean_segment.description: Start cleaning of the specified segment(s).

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning repeats for each segment.

vacuum_load_multi_map.name: Vacuum camera map load multi map

map_flag.name: Map flag
map_flag.description: The id of the map to be loaded

permit.name: Permit
permit.description: Allows nodes to join the Zigbee network.

ieee.name: IEEE
ieee.description: IEEE address of the node permitting new joins.

source_ieee.name: Source IEEE
source_ieee.description: IEEE address of the joining device (must be combined with the 'Install code' field).

install_code.name: Install code
install_code.description: Install code of the joining device (must be combined with the 'Source IEEE' field).

qr_code.name: QR code
qr_code.description: Provides both the IEEE address and the install code of the joining device (different between vendors).

remove.name: Remove
remove.description: Removes a node from the Zigbee network.

ieee.name: IEEE
ieee.description: IEEE address of the node to remove.

set_zigbee_cluster_attribute.name: Set Zigbee cluster attribute
set_zigbee_cluster_attribute.description: Sets an attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_id.name: Cluster ID
cluster_id.description: ZCL cluster to retrieve attributes for.

attribute.name: Attribute
attribute.description: ID of the attribute to set.

value.name: Value
value.description: Value to write to the attribute.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer code. Use a value of "-1" to force no code to be set.

issue_zigbee_cluster_command.name: Issue Zigbee cluster command
issue_zigbee_cluster_command.description: Issues a command on the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_id.name: Cluster ID
cluster_id.description: ZCL cluster to retrieve attributes for.

command.name: Command
command.description: ID of the command to execute.

command_type.name: Command Type
command_type.description: Type of the command to execute.

args.name: Args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command.

params.name: Params
params.description: Parameters to pass to the command.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer code. Use a value of "-1" to force no code to be set.

issue_zigbee_group_command.name: Issue Zigbee group command
issue_zigbee_group_command.description: Issues a command on the specified cluster on the specified group.

cluster_id.name: Cluster ID
cluster_id.description: ZCL cluster to send command to.

command.name: Command
command.description: ID of the command to execute.

args.name: Args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer code. Use a value of "-1" to force no code to be set.

warning_device_squawk.name: Warning device squawk
warning_device_squawk.description: This action uses the WD capabilities to emit a quick audible/visible pulse called a "squawk". The squawk command has no effect if the WD is currently active (warning in progress).

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The Squawk Mode field is used as a 4-bit enumeration, and can have one of the values shown in Table 8-24 of the ZCL spec - Squawk Mode Field. The exact operation of each mode (how the WD squawks) is implementation specific.

strobe.name: Strobe
strobe.description: The strobe field is used as a Boolean, and determines if the visual indication is also required in addition to the audible squawk, as shown in Table 8-25 of the ZCL spec - Strobe Bit.

level.name: Level
level.description: The squawk level field is used as a 2-bit enumeration, and determines the intensity of audible squawk sound as shown in Table 8-26 of the ZCL spec - Squawk Level Field Values.

warning_device_warn.name: Warning device starts alert
warning_device_warn.description: This action starts the operation of the warning device. The warning device alerts the surrounding area by audible (siren) and visual (strobe) signals.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The Warning Mode field is used as a 4-bit enumeration, can have one of the values 0-6 defined below in table 8-20 of the ZCL spec. The exact behavior of the warning device in each mode is according to the relevant security standards.

strobe.name: Strobe
strobe.description: The Strobe field is used as a 2-bit enumeration, and determines if the visual indication is required in addition to the audible siren, as indicated in Table 8-21 of the ZCL spec. "0" means no strobe, "1" means strobe. If the strobe field is 1 and the Warning Mode is 0 (Stop), then only the strobe is activated.

level.name: Level
level.description: The Siren Level field is used as a 2-bit enumeration, and indicates the intensity of audible squawk sound as shown in Table 8-22 of the ZCL spec.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Requested duration of warning, in seconds (16 bit). If both Strobe and Warning Mode are "0" this field is ignored.

duty_cycle.name: Duty cycle
duty_cycle.description: Indicates the length of the flash cycle. This allows you to vary the flash duration for different alarm types (e.g., fire, police, burglar). The valid range is 0-100 in increments of 10. All other values must be rounded to the nearest valid value. Strobe calculates a duty cycle over a duration of one second. The ON state must precede the OFF state. For example, if the Strobe Duty Cycle field specifies 40,, then the strobe flashes ON for 4/10ths of a second and then turns OFF for 6/10ths of a second.

intensity.name: Intensity
intensity.description: Indicates the intensity of the strobe as shown in Table 8-23 of the ZCL spec. This attribute is designed to vary the output of the strobe (i.e., brightness) and not its frequency, which is detailed in section 8.4.2.3.1.6 of the ZCL spec.

set_lock_user_code.name: Set lock user code
set_lock_user_code.description: Sets a user code on a lock.

code_slot.name: Code slot
code_slot.description: Code slot to set the code in.

enable_lock_user_code.name: Enable lock user
enable_lock_user_code.description: Enables a user code on a lock.

disable_lock_user_code.name: Disable lock user
disable_lock_user_code.description: Disables a user code on a lock.

clear_lock_user_code.name: Clear lock user
clear_lock_user_code.description: Clears a user code from a lock.

code_slot.name: Code slot
code_slot.description: Code slot to clear code from.

tone.name: Tone
tone.description: The tone to emit. When `available_tones` property is a map, either the key or the value can be used. Must be supported by the integration.

volume_level.name: Volume
volume_level.description: The volume. 0 is inaudible, 1 is the maximum volume. Must be supported by the integration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Number of seconds the sound is played. Must be supported by the integration.
